meta.label: Snowflake Tools
meta.description: Facilitates fast loading between Snowflake <--> S3/HDFS
meta.author: Outra (Matt Klaber)

params.name: default_sf_stage
params.label: Default Snowflake Stage
params.description: This stage should point to the same folder as the managed HDFS connection

params.name: default_sf_storage_integration
params.label: Default Snowflake Storage Integration
params.description: This storage integration should allow for access to the same folder as the managed S3 connection
